segments.text: I've got to get dad a Father's Day gift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for reminding me . It always slips my mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This year I'm going to get him a gag gift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! That's a great idea . What did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have a tradition in my family ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , ties . And there's a tie store . Let's go !
segments.speaker: S1
